Well Tank Repairs and Replacements

CT Well Tank Repairs and Replacements

  • Guaranteed Best Well Tank Prices In Connecticut, No Questions Asked.
  • Our Prices Include All Tank Tee Fittings and Labor.
  • 1 Year warranty for labor and we honor all factory warranties.

Water Dr. LLC specializes in well tank replacement and repairs. ALL tanks work the same way, with pressurized air, forcing water out to the house. If you are experiencing low pressure or low volume of water to your faucets, it could be from your well tank (it may only need to be SERVICED- Check out our post on typical annual service).

The brands of tanks that we typically use is Well X Trol made by Amtrol or Challenger made by Flexcon. Links are provided to each of their websites so you can check them out. With EVERY installation we make sure to replace every part of the controls that connects the tank to your house (Picture Provided on the Right).

If you would like to schedule a FREE quote to determine what your needs are, give us a call and we can take care of that for you.

If you have no water, donâ€™t hesitate to call us any time.

Our expert plumbers have years of experience with well pumps, both installation and repair. We will have your well running properly in no time.
